cvwriting.title: Managing Self & Personal development
cvwriting.description: A personal development plan can help you grow and develop your potential, attain your goals, and undergo self-transformation.

cvwriting.title: Working in Highly Successful Team
cvwriting.description: Teams and individuals may recognize their strengths and weaknesses, facts and assumptions through having informed and constructive talks.

cvwriting.title: Employability Skills Workshop
cvwriting.description: Whether you work for a company that is owned by someone else or run your own business, you will undoubtedly need to attend some organizational skills training.

cvwriting.title: Critical thinking- Creativity
cvwriting.description: Critical thinking helps you to get rid of prejudices, and assertions that are thrown at you through various means and make sense of what is offered.
